titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-113, by Mr. Perlmutter.

The resolution waives clause 6(a) of rule XIII (requiring a two-thirds vote to consider a rule on the same day it is reported from the Rules Committee) against certain resolutions reported from the Rules Committee. The rule applies the waiver to any resolution reported on the legislative day of May 19, 2009, providing for consideration or disposition of S. 896, a bill to prevent mortgage foreclosures and enhance mortgage credit availability.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 54.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 456, H. Res. 450 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendar and Committee Reports) to allow consideration of S. 896 (Helping Families Save Their Homes Act of 2009) on the same day it is presented to the House.
